kube_list_error: An error has occurred loading your clusters.
kube_common_node_pool_title_multiple: Configure one or more node pools (optional)
kubernetes_add_private_network: Choose a private network for this cluster
kubernetes_add_private_network_descripti: IP addresses from the selected private network’s VLAN will be assigned to your nodes.
kube_list_node_pools: Need persistent volumes for multiple pods across different nodes and availability zones? Try our fully managed File Storage service, compatible with Managed Kubernetes Service. Enjoy ‘Read Write Many’ volumes that seamlessly scale with your clusters, starting from 10 GB.
kube_list_node_pools_floating_ip_warning: Activating Floating IPs incurs an additional cost. Each current and future instance of this node pool will be assigned a Floating IP charged at {{price}}.
Deactivation will result in the immediate detachment of the Floating IPs. These addresses will be permanently released and cannot be recovered.
